title: Emma’s Bad Habit♡
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Emma-san, here, here! There’s a bakery around the corner that I recommend-.... Ah, waaaah!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Honoka-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Uwaaa, that surprised me! Ahaha, I tripped<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Are you okay? Are you hurt anywhere?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’m totally fine! The bread is more important~~! The carrot bread is going to be baked in one more minute! Let’s go, quickly~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hnnn~, Buo~no! It’s slightly sweet and so delicious<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Isn’t it? This carrot bread is a special bread that is only baked on the weekends~. Ah.... the breadcrumbs~ what a waste!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Honoka-chan.... You’re not exactly like Karin-chan, but you’re the type of person that makes people want to take care of you, huh.... Here, let’s spread this handkerchief on your lap, okay, it’ll be fine if the breadcrumbs fall down now<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeh~, Karin-san has always been taken care of like this by you, Emma-san? That must be so nice-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
